properties.entry:
Example code and data for "Practical Data Science with R" by Nina Zumel and John Mount, Manning 2014. The book: "Practical Data Science with R" by Nina Zumel and John Mount, Manning 2014: http://www.manning.com/zumel/ (book copyright Manning Publications Co., all rights reserved) The support site: https://github.com/WinVector/zmPDSwR This zip file: https://github.com/WinVector/zmPDSwR/blob/master/CodeExamples.zip
